header.iwrsInterfaceDesc: 患者随机化和治疗组分配
header.adverseEventsDesc: 通过电话自动追踪不良事件
header.patientSurveyDesc: 通过电话进行预定调查

hero.title: 用AI改变
hero.description: Omega CRO将IWRS转变为决策驱动工具。我们的平台使用AI设计和优化您的随机化和给药策略。它从历史数据中学习，模拟试验场景，分析运营指标，确保平衡的患者组、不间断的IMP供应和最大化的试验效率。

features.title: 智能功能
features.subtitle: 优化临床试验的AI驱动解决方案
features.mainSubtitle: 在每一步都提供AI驱动的洞察，运行高效、合规的临床试验所需的一切。

aiDrivenOptimization.title: AI驱动的优化
aiDrivenOptimization.description: 机器学习算法分析历史试验数据，推荐最优随机化策略并预测供应需求。

balancedRandomization.title: 平衡随机化
balancedRandomization.description: 通过智能分层因子分析，确保治疗组之间患者组完美平衡。

supplyChainIntelligence.title: 供应链智能
supplyChainIntelligence.description: 实时IMP供应预测通过预测分析防止缺货并最小化浪费。

scenarioSimulation.title: 场景模拟
scenarioSimulation.description: 在启动前模拟不同的试验场景，以识别潜在瓶颈并优化资源分配。

regulatoryCompliance.title: 法规合规
regulatoryCompliance.description: 内置FDA 21 CFR Part 11和EMA合规性，具有完整的审计追踪和验证文档。

rapidDeployment.title: 快速部署
rapidDeployment.description: 使用预配置模板和自动研究设置，在几天而非几个月内启动您的研究。

platform.title: AI驱动的
platform.description: 我们的IWRS平台在您的工作流程中直接提供实时AI建议。从随机化分层到供应预测，每个决策都有智能分析支持。

smartRecommendations.title: 智能推荐
smartRecommendations.description: 根据您的试验参数获得AI驱动的最优分层因子建议。

predictiveAnalytics.title: 预测分析
predictiveAnalytics.description: 通过机器学习预测药物供应需求并优化库存水平。

realtimeMonitoring.title: 实时监控
realtimeMonitoring.description: 追踪关键指标并在出现潜在问题时收到警报。

realTimeMonitoring.title: Real-Time Monitoring
realTimeMonitoring.description: Track randomization balance and supply levels with live dashboards and instant alerts.

aiModule.title: 适应性学习
aiModule.description: 我们的专有AI模块从您不断发展的试验数据中学习，完善运营策略并支持关键决策。

adaptiveRandomization.title: 适应性随机化
adaptiveRandomization.description: AI在研究进行时调整随机化策略以保持平衡。

predictiveDosing.title: 预测性给药
predictiveDosing.description: 基于患者特征和反应数据优化给药方案。

operationalInsights.title: 运营洞察
operationalInsights.description: 获得关于研究性能和资源利用的可操作洞察。

realTimeMonitoring.title: Real-Time Monitoring
realTimeMonitoring.description: Monitor clinical operations with instant insights and early detection of potential issues.

compliance.title: 企业级
compliance.description: 使用行业领先的安全标准和全面的法规合规性保护您的试验数据。

gdprCompliance.title: GDPR/KVKK合规
gdprCompliance.description: 完全符合欧洲和土耳其数据保护法规。

fdaCompliance.title: FDA 21 CFR Part 11
fdaCompliance.description: 满足所有FDA电子记录和电子签名要求。

dataEncryption.title: 数据加密
dataEncryption.description: 所有静止和传输中的数据使用AES-256加密。

auditTrails.title: 完整审计追踪
auditTrails.description: 每个操作都记录有时间戳和用户识别。

accessControl.title: 基于角色的访问
accessControl.description: 细粒度的权限控制敏感数据访问。

backupRecovery.title: 备份与恢复
backupRecovery.description: 自动备份和灾难恢复能力。

compliance.subtitle: Launch and run your study seamlessly with our FDA/EMA-compliant intelligent system.

fda.title: FDA 21 CFR Part 11
fda.description: Full compliance with electronic records and signatures requirements

ema.title: EMA Guidelines
ema.description: Meets all European Medicines Agency standards for clinical trials

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: SOC 2 certified with end-to-end encryption and secure data centers

cta.title: Ready to transform your clinical trials?
cta.description: Join leading pharmaceutical and biotech companies using Omega CRO to accelerate their research.

phoneServices.title: 电话辅助
phoneServices.description: 通过自动电话和短信系统增强患者参与度和数据收集。所有服务都符合GDPR/KVKK标准并集成到您的IWRS平台中。

adverseEvents.title: 不良事件报告
adverseEvents.description: 通过电话/短信自动收集参与者的副作用数据。结构化响应确保一致的数据质量。

medicationReminder.title: 用药提醒
medicationReminder.description: 自动提醒包括剂量、时间和说明。减少错过的剂量并提高依从性。

appointmentReminder.title: 预约提醒
appointmentReminder.description: 诊所访问、实验室和随访的自动通知。日历集成和确认追踪。

patientSurvey.title: 患者调查
patientSurvey.description: 通过电话/短信自动调查满意度、治疗反应和生活质量。预定交付和即时数据访问。

modules.title: 我们的核心模块
modules.subtitle: 临床试验管理
modules.description: Omega CRO平台包含端到端管理临床试验所需的所有基本模块。

iwrs.title: 随机化系统 (IWRS)
iwrs.description: AI驱动的智能随机化和患者分配系统。根据研究方案创建平衡的患者组。

unblinding.title: 紧急揭盲
unblinding.description: 紧急情况下安全且受控的揭盲系统。通过自动记录和报告确保法规合规性。

inventory.title: 库存管理系统
inventory.description: 跟踪IMP库存，监控冷链，并接收自动警报。实时库存控制。

security.title: 数据安全与合规
security.description: 符合GDPR/KVKK的数据保护、加密和访问控制。符合21 CFR Part 11标准的安全性。

cta.title: 准备好转变您的
cta.description: 加入已经利用AI驱动的IWRS提高试验效率和合规性的领先CRO。

footer.cta_title: 为您的项目寻找合适的合作伙伴吗？
footer.cta_description: 探索我们致力于改善人类健康的创新临床研究解决方案。联系我们，让您的项目更上一层楼。
footer.slogan: 您在临床研究中可靠的合作伙伴。
footer.newsletter_description: 不要错过我们的最新消息和创新。

contact.title: 开始使用
contact.description: 填写表格，我们的团队将尽快与您联系，讨论您的临床试验需求。

seo.title: IWRS演示 | 交互式网络响应系统 | Omega CRO
seo.description: 体验我们的AI驱动IWRS平台，用于临床试验患者随机化、治疗分配和盲法管理。

iwrs.title: IWRS平台
iwrs.description: 体验我们的AI驱动随机化系统进行患者注册和治疗分配。

seo.title: 不良事件报告 | 电话辅助临床服务 | Omega CRO
seo.description: 通过自动电话和短信系统收集和管理临床试验不良事件数据。符合GDPR/KVKK标准。

adverseEventsCall.title: 不良事件报告
adverseEventsCall.description: 通过自动电话/短信收集参与者的副作用数据。所有数据都加密存储，研究人员可以立即访问。

step1.title: 自动呼叫
step1.description: 系统在预定时间呼叫参与者或参与者可以呼入报告副作用。

step2.title: 结构化数据收集
step2.description: 通过语音响应或短信收集副作用信息。标准化问题确保数据质量。

step3.title: 即时研究人员访问
step3.description: 收集的数据立即在IWRS仪表板中可用。严重事件触发即时警报。

multiLanguage.title: 多语言支持
multiLanguage.description: 以参与者的首选语言收集数据。

realTimeAlerts.title: 实时警报
realTimeAlerts.description: 严重不良事件通过短信/电子邮件立即通知研究人员。

dataValidation.title: 自动验证
dataValidation.description: 内置验证规则确保数据完整性和准确性。

complianceReady.title: 合规就绪
complianceReady.description: 满足所有法规报告要求和时间线。

automaticCalls.title: Automatic Call System
automaticCalls.description: Adverse event queries are conducted through automatic calls to participants at specified periods. Responses are instantly recorded in the system.

smsReminders.title: SMS Reminders
smsReminders.description: SMS reminders are sent to participants to report adverse events. Quick feedback is received with easy response options.

secureRecording.title: Secure Recording
secureRecording.description: All reports are encrypted and recorded in compliance with KVKK/GDPR and shared securely with the research team.

consent.title: 参与者同意
consent.description: 所有参与者在注册期间提供明确的电话联系和数据收集同意。

dataProtection.title: 数据保护
dataProtection.description: 所有通话记录和数据都加密存储。完全符合GDPR/KVKK要求。

auditTrail.title: 审计追踪
auditTrail.description: 每个呼叫和数据条目都记录有完整的时间戳和用户追踪。

cta.title: 集成到您的IWRS中
cta.description: 不良事件报告作为我们完整IWRS平台的一部分提供。

hero.title: Adverse Events Reporting
hero.subtitle: Automated Tracking and Reporting via Phone
hero.description: Regular reminders and secure recording system for potential drug side effects via call or SMS to participants

step1.title: Scheduled Calls
step1.description: The system automatically calls participants at specified times and asks questions like 'Have you experienced any unexpected side effects in the last three days?'

step2.title: Response Recording
step2.description: Participant responses are recorded in the system via voice or keypad. Detailed questions are triggered upon receiving a 'yes' answer.

step3.title: Team Notification
step3.description: Adverse event reports are instantly communicated to the research team. Serious cases are marked as urgent alerts.

step4.title: Follow-up and Reporting
step4.description: All reports are documented and archived in accordance with regulatory reporting requirements.

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: All patient data is processed in accordance with KVKK/GDPR standards. Calls are conducted over encrypted lines. Participant consent and confidentiality agreements are meticulously followed.

seo.title: 用药提醒 | 电话辅助临床服务 | Omega CRO
seo.description: 通过自动电话和短信提醒提高临床试验中的患者依从性。改善依从性和数据收集。

medicationReminder.title: 用药提醒
medicationReminder.description: 自动提醒帮助参与者遵守用药计划。包括剂量、时间和说明，提高依从性和试验数据质量。

step1.title: 方案设置
step1.description: 在IWRS中定义每个治疗组的用药计划、时间和剂量。

step2.title: 自动提醒
step2.description: 系统在预定时间通过电话或短信呼叫/发送消息给参与者。

step3.title: 确认追踪
step3.description: 参与者确认摄入。错过的剂量触发随访并记录以供依从性分析。

flexibleScheduling.title: 灵活的时间安排
flexibleScheduling.description: 支持复杂的给药方案，包括多次每日剂量和变化的时间表。

personalization.title: 个性化消息
personalization.description: 提醒可以个性化包括参与者姓名、具体剂量和说明。

complianceTracking.title: 依从性追踪
complianceTracking.description: 详细的依从性指标和报告集成到您的IWRS仪表板中。

missedDoseAlerts.title: 错过剂量警报
missedDoseAlerts.description: 当参与者错过剂量时，自动升级到站点协调员。

scheduledReminders.title: Scheduled Reminders
scheduledReminders.description: Automatic reminder calls or SMS are sent at personalized medication intake times for each participant.

doseInformation.title: Dose Information
doseInformation.description: Reminder messages include dose amount, administration method, and special instructions.

confirmationTracking.title: Confirmation Tracking
confirmationTracking.description: Participants are asked to confirm that they have taken their medication and adherence rates are automatically recorded.

reminderContent.title: 提醒内容
reminderContent.instructions: 特殊说明（例如，与食物一起服用）

benefits.title: 益处

improvedCompliance.title: 提高依从性
improvedCompliance.description: 研究显示定期提醒可将依从性提高40%。

dataQuality.title: 更好的数据质量
dataQuality.description: 减少因错过剂量而导致的协议偏差和数据差距。

patientEngagement.title: 增强参与度
patientEngagement.description: 定期沟通使参与者参与并致力于研究。

benefits.description: The medication reminder system increases treatment adherence by up to 40%, reduces protocol violations, and improves study quality.

cta.title: 集成到您的IWRS中
cta.description: 用药提醒作为我们完整IWRS平台的一部分提供。

hero.title: Medication Reminder
hero.subtitle: Automated System to Improve Treatment Adherence
hero.description: Automatic reminders for medication intake time via call or message to patients in treatment program

step1.title: Time Setting
step1.description: Medication intake times are defined in the system for each participant according to the study protocol.

step2.title: Automatic Reminder
step2.description: A call or SMS is sent to the participant at the specified time: 'Time to take your medication - 2 tablets with breakfast'.

step3.title: Confirmation
step3.description: The participant is asked to confirm that they have taken the medication. If no confirmation is given, the reminder is repeated.

step4.title: Adherence Reporting
step4.description: All medication intake records and adherence rates are automatically reported and monitored.

seo.title: 预约提醒 | 电话辅助临床服务 | Omega CRO
seo.description: 减少临床试验中的缺席。通过电话和短信自动提醒诊所访问、实验室和随访。

appointmentReminder.title: 预约提醒
appointmentReminder.description: 确保参与者不会错过重要的诊所访问、实验室预约和随访。自动通知具有日历集成和确认追踪。

step1.title: 访问安排
step1.description: 在IWRS中安排访问并定义提醒时间线（例如，7天，1天，1小时前）。

step2.title: 自动通知
step2.description: 系统根据您的时间线通过电话和短信发送提醒。

step3.title: 确认与重新安排
step3.description: 参与者可以确认或要求重新安排。站点协调员在仪表板中收到更新。

multipleReminders.title: 多次提醒
multipleReminders.description: 在预约前的不同时间间隔发送多次提醒。

calendarIntegration.title: 日历集成
calendarIntegration.description: 参与者可以通过链接将预约添加到他们的个人日历。

visitDetails.title: 详细访问信息
visitDetails.description: 包括访问类型、位置、停车说明和所需的禁食/准备。

confirmationTracking.title: 确认追踪
confirmationTracking.description: 实时追踪谁已确认、谁需要随访以及谁要求重新安排。

confirmationRequest.title: Attendance Confirmation
confirmationRequest.description: Participants are asked to confirm that they will attend the appointment, reducing no-show rates.

reschedulingSupport.title: Rescheduling Support
reschedulingSupport.description: Participants can easily reschedule their appointments with the automatic system, and empty slots are immediately filled.

reminderTypes.title: 提醒类型
reminderTypes.labTests: 实验室检测和样本收集

reducedNoShows.title: 减少缺席
reducedNoShows.description: 自动提醒可将缺席率降低多达60%。

betterCoordination.title: 改善协调
betterCoordination.description: 站点工作人员提前知道预期出席情况，可以更好地计划。

costSavings.title: 成本节约
costSavings.description: 减少因错过访问和必要的重新安排而浪费的时间和资源。

cta.title: 集成到您的IWRS中
cta.description: 预约提醒作为我们完整IWRS平台的一部分提供。

hero.title: Appointment Reminder
hero.subtitle: Smart System to Increase Participation Rates
hero.description: Automatic reminders for clinical visits, laboratory, control or follow-up appointments via call/SMS to participants

step1.title: Appointment Definition
step1.description: Clinical visits, laboratory tests, or control appointments are entered into the system.

step2.title: Reminder Delivery
step2.description: Participants are notified at specified times: 'You have an appointment with Dr. Yılmaz on Friday at 2:00 PM'.

step3.title: Confirmation Tracking
step3.description: Participants respond with options 'Yes, I will come' or 'I want to reschedule'.

step4.title: Team Notification
step4.description: Unconfirmed or rescheduled appointments are notified to the research team and necessary actions are taken.

seo.title: 患者调查 | 电话辅助临床服务 | Omega CRO
seo.description: 通过自动电话和短信调查收集临床试验结果数据。评估满意度、治疗反应和生活质量。

patientSurvey.title: 患者调查
patientSurvey.description: 通过电话和短信自动调查参与者的满意度、治疗反应和生活质量。预定交付和即时数据访问。

step1.title: 调查设计
step1.description: 在IWRS中创建自定义调查或使用验证的工具（例如，SF-36，EQ-5D）。

step2.title: 自动交付
step2.description: 系统根据您的方案时间线通过电话或短信呼叫参与者。

step3.title: 数据收集
step3.description: 响应自动记录、验证并在您的IWRS仪表板中可用。

validatedInstruments.title: 验证的工具
validatedInstruments.description: 支持标准调查和自定义问卷的库。

adaptiveSurveys.title: 适应性调查
adaptiveSurveys.description: 问题可以根据先前的响应进行分支和适应。

multipleFormats.title: 多种格式
multipleFormats.description: 通过语音响应、短信或电子邮件链接收集响应。

realTimeData.title: 实时数据
realTimeData.description: 响应立即集成到您的试验数据库中以供分析。

automatedSurveys.title: Automated Survey Delivery
automatedSurveys.description: Surveys are automatically sent to participants via phone or SMS at specified periods.

privacyCompliant.title: Privacy Compliant
privacyCompliant.description: All survey data is processed with participant consent and in accordance with KVKK/GDPR standards.

satisfaction.title: 满意度调查
satisfaction.description: 衡量对治疗过程及参与研究体验的满意度

adherence.title: 治疗依从性调查
adherence.description: 衡量服药频率、副作用体验及方案依从性

seo.title: 常见问题 | Omega CRO IWRS平台
seo.description: 查找有关Omega CRO的AI驱动IWRS平台、定价、实施和支持的常见问题的答案。
seo.keywords: FAQ, randomization, IWRS, clinical trial, Q&A

faq.title: 常见
faq.description: 查找有关我们的AI驱动IWRS平台的常见问题的答案。

q1.question: 什么是IWRS？
q1.answer: IWRS（交互式网络响应系统）是临床试验中用于患者随机化、治疗分配和药物管理的网络系统。我们的AI驱动平台通过预测分析和自动化增强了传统IWRS。

q2.question: 您的AI如何改进随机化？
q2.answer: 我们的AI分析历史试验数据以推荐最优随机化策略，预测入组模式，识别潜在的平衡问题，并在研究进行时建议调整以维持平衡。

q3.question: 该平台是否符合FDA和EMA法规？
q3.answer: 是的，我们的平台完全符合FDA 21 CFR Part 11、EMA指南、GDPR和KVKK。我们提供完整的验证文档和审计追踪。

q1.question: 设置一项研究需要多长时间？
q1.answer: 使用我们的预配置模板和自动化工作流程，大多数研究可以在2-3周内设置完成，而传统IWRS需要2-3个月。

q2.question: 您提供哪些支持？
q2.answer: 我们提供全天候技术支持、专门的项目经理、综合培训和关于随机化策略和统计设计的持续咨询。

q3.question: 该平台能否与其他系统集成？
q3.answer: 是的，我们提供与主要EDC系统、eTMF平台、安全数据库和EHR系统的API集成。

q1.question: 您如何收费？
q1.answer: 定价基于研究复杂性、患者数量和所需功能。我们提供灵活的每次研究和企业许可模式。联系我们获取自定义报价。

q2.question: 是否有设置费用？
q2.answer: 设置费用取决于研究复杂性和定制要求。我们提供标准研究设计的打包价格。

q3.question: 我可以在提交前试用该平台吗？
q3.answer: 是的，我们提供全功能演示和可选的试点项目，让您在完全实施前体验该平台。

q1.question: 数据存储在哪里？
q1.answer: 数据存储在符合SOC 2、HIPAA和ISO 27001的安全云服务器上。我们可以根据要求提供本地或特定地区的托管。

q2.question: 您使用什么安全措施？
q2.answer: 我们使用AES-256加密、多因素认证、基于角色的访问控制、定期安全审计和渗透测试。

q3.question: 该平台是否支持盲法研究？
q3.answer: 是的，我们支持单盲、双盲和三盲研究，具有安全的盲法维护、紧急揭盲程序和完整的审计追踪。

cta.title: 还有问题吗？
cta.description: 我们的团队在这里帮助您。联系我们获取详细信息。

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Omega CRO IWRS platform and our services

q1.question: What is randomization and why is it important?
q1.answer: Randomization is the process of randomly assigning patients to treatment arms in clinical trials. This method ensures comparability between study groups and eliminates selection bias. Omega CRO IWRS platform supports simple randomization, block randomization, stratified randomization, and adaptive randomization methods. Our AI-powered system recommends optimal randomization strategies and monitors balance in real-time.

q2.question: What is the difference between block randomization and stratified randomization?
q2.answer: Block randomization ensures balanced allocation within blocks of a certain number of patients and maintains numerical balance between treatment groups. Stratified randomization divides patients into subgroups based on important prognostic factors (such as age, gender, disease stage) and applies separate randomization within each subgroup. Omega CRO IWRS supports both methods and even allows you to combine them for 'stratified block randomization'.

q3.question: How does adaptive randomization work?
q3.answer: Adaptive randomization learns from data collected as the study progresses and dynamically adjusts randomization ratios. For example, if better results are seen in one treatment arm than expected, the system can assign more patients to that arm. Omega CRO's AI-powered module suggests adaptive strategies through real-time data analysis, implements these strategies after ethics committee approval, and documents all changes in detail.

q4.question: What are the main features of the IWRS system?
q4.answer: Omega CRO IWRS (Interactive Web Response System) offers central randomization, drug supply management, patient enrollment tracking, site management, real-time reporting, and GCP-compliant audit trail features. The system is accessible 24/7, has multilingual support, and can be used from all devices (computer, tablet, phone). It is fully compliant with FDA 21 CFR Part 11 and EMA requirements.

q5.question: How is IMP (Investigational Medicinal Product) supply management done with IWRS?
q5.answer: The IWRS system tracks each site's drug inventory in real-time, predicts future needs based on patient randomization rate, and automatically generates resupply alerts. Our AI module analyzes historical study data to suggest optimal stock levels, applies FEFO (First Expired, First Out) principle based on expiration dates, and minimizes waste. Additionally, special tracking and alarm systems are available for drugs requiring cold chain.

q6.question: What happens if a protocol amendment is needed during the study?
q6.answer: Omega CRO IWRS has a flexible structure to manage protocol amendments. When changes are needed in critical parameters such as randomization algorithm, number of treatment arms, stratification factors, the system maintains full data integrity before and after the change. All changes are recorded in the audit trail and detailed documentation is provided for submission to regulatory authorities. Validation tests are performed automatically.

q7.question: What features does the warehouse module include?
q7.answer: The warehouse module offers real-time inventory tracking, barcode/RFID integration, expiration date management, cold chain monitoring (2-8°C, -20°C, -80°C), automatic stock alerts, drug dispensing according to FEFO principle, detailed inventory reports, and GCP-compliant audit trail. In multi-center studies, central warehouse and site-based stock management is available.

q8.question: How is cold chain tracking done?
q8.answer: Our system provides 24/7 temperature and humidity monitoring with IoT sensors. When specified limits are exceeded, automatic SMS, email, and mobile app notifications are sent. All temperature data is recorded and reported on a second-by-second basis. Emergency action plans are activated in critical situations such as power outages or freezer failures. All required documentation for regulatory audits can be presented ready.

q9.question: What is done in case of a drug recall?
q9.answer: In case of a recall, the IWRS system immediately identifies all drugs with the relevant lot/batch number and shows which sites they are at. The system automatically sends notifications to all relevant sites, marks the drugs in question as 'unusable', and provides a list for patient communication. All transactions are recorded in the audit trail and documentation required for regulatory reporting is automatically generated.

q10.question: How is data security ensured?
q10.answer: Omega CRO has an ISO 27001 certified information security management system. Data is protected with 256-bit AES encryption, encryption is applied both in the database (at rest) and during transmission (in transit). Multi-factor authentication (MFA), role-based access control (RBAC), and regular penetration tests are performed. All servers are hosted in secure, geographically distributed data centers.

q11.question: How is KVKK and GDPR compliance ensured?
q11.answer: Our system is fully compliant with KVKK and GDPR requirements for personal data protection. Patient information texts, explicit consent management, data subject rights (access, correction, deletion, data portability), data processing inventory, data breach notification mechanisms are integrated. Regular KVKK/GDPR compliance audits are conducted and all necessary documentation is provided.

q12.question: What is FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliance?
q12.answer: FDA 21 CFR Part 11 is the US regulation for electronic records and electronic signatures. Omega CRO IWRS is fully compliant with this regulation: immutable audit trail, electronic signature validation, user access control, data integrity, system validation, and regular backups are performed. All critical transactions are approved with electronic signatures and system validation documentation is kept ready.
